item.title: Average long-term US mortgage rate drops to 6.19%, lowest level in more than a year
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage fell again this week, dropping to its lowest level in more than a year

item.title: Trump pardons Binance founder Changpeng Zhao
item.description: President Donald Trump has pardoned Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, who created the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange
